segment.source: Get started: is a cloud service to which you subscribe.
segment.target: Get started: is a cloud service to which you subscribe.

segment.source: You then add users and manage devices through and administration console.
segment.target: You then add users and manage devices through and administration console.

segment.source: You can try a free subscription and you may also want to review different ways to manage devices.
segment.target: You can try a free subscription and you may also want to review different ways to manage devices.

segment.source: There's also some useful information to know before you start.
segment.target: There's also some useful information to know before you start.

segment.source: Enroll devices: Whether your users are bringing their own devices (BYOD) or you distribute company-owned devices (COD), enrollment lets users access information such as email, business apps, and company data while you retain control of its management and security.
segment.target: Enroll devices: Whether your users are bringing their own devices (BYOD) or you distribute company-owned devices (COD), enrollment lets users access information such as email, business apps, and company data while you retain control of its management and security.

segment.source: can also manage Windows computers as mobile devices or with the client software.
segment.target: can also manage Windows computers as mobile devices or with the client software.

segment.source: Get ready to enroll devices in Microsoft Intune.
segment.target: Get ready to enroll devices in Microsoft Intune.

segment.source: Manage and protect resources: lets you configure devices, manage policies to ensure security and compliance, manage apps and data, remote lock or reset devices, and much more.
segment.target: Manage and protect resources: lets you configure devices, manage policies to ensure security and compliance, manage apps and data, remote lock or reset devices, and much more.

segment.source: Retire devices and reclaim licenses: Whenever a device is lost or a user leaves the company, you need to be able to act to protect company assets, recycle licenses, and redistribute devices.
segment.target: Retire devices and reclaim licenses: Whenever a device is lost or a user leaves the company, you need to be able to act to protect company assets, recycle licenses, and redistribute devices.

segment.source: lets you lock, monitor, and reset devices to their factory settings or selectively wipe devices of company assets while leaving the user's personal data in place.
segment.target: lets you lock, monitor, and reset devices to their factory settings or selectively wipe devices of company assets while leaving the user's personal data in place.

segment.source: Read more about retiring data and devices.
segment.target: Read more about retiring data and devices.
